docs.summary:
The wix-crm-backend module contains functionality for working with
 your site's [price quotes](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-price-quotes)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Price Quotes API, import `wixCrm` from the `wix-crm-backend` module:

params.name: createPriceQuoteRequest
params.doc: The data used to create a price quote.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID and version of the created price quote.

docs.summary: Creates a new price quote.
description: The `createPriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created price quote's
ID and version when the price quote is created.

params.name: id
params.doc: The ID of the price quote to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified price quote is deleted.

docs.summary: Delete a price quote by ID.
description: The `deletePriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the price quote with the specified ID is deleted.

examples.title: Delete a price quote by ID

params.name: id
params.doc: The ID of the price quote to get.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The price quote with the given ID.

docs.summary: Gets an existing price quote by ID.
description: The `getPriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the price quote

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

params.name: updatePriceQuoteRequest
params.doc: The data used to update a price quote.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID and version of the created price quote.

docs.summary: Updates an existing price quote.
description: The `updatePriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the updated price quote
ID and version when the price quote is updated.
If the existing price quote contains information that is not included
in the updated price quote, that information is lost. For example, if a price
quote contains metadata information, but when updating the quote no metadata information is
sent, the updated quote will not have any metadata.

docs.summary: An object that contains address information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains calculated tax information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains information needed to create price quote.

members.name: data
members.doc: Price quote fields used to create the price quote.

docs.summary: An object that contains customer information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains discount information.
An object that contains Error result information.
An object that contains id and version information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains Itemized fee information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains line item information.

docs.summary: An object that contains Line item tax information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains locale information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: language
members.doc: Locale language. An ISO 639 alpha-2 or alpha-3 language code, or a language subtag.

members.name: country
members.doc: Locale country, An ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code or a UN M.49 numeric-3 area code.

docs.summary: An object that contains metadata information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: sourceProperties
members.doc: Metadata additional data as key:value string pairs.

docs.summary: An object that contains payment terms information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: termType
members.doc:
Price quote term type.
 One of:

 + `"DueOnReceipt"`
 + `"NetPlus"`
 + `"TimeStamp"`
 + `"Other"`

docs.summary: An object that contains Price quote information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: List of Price quote line items.

members.name: taxes
members.doc: List of taxes calculated based on the line items.

members.name: invoiceId
members.doc: Price quote invoice ID, when converting price quote to invoice.

docs.summary: An object that contains price quote date information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: issueDate
members.doc: Price quote issue date as ISO String. Send this date when creating a new price quote.

members.name: validThroughDate
members.doc: Price quote valid through date as ISO String. Send this date when creating a new price quote.

members.name: acceptanceDate
members.doc: Price quote acceptance date as ISO String.

members.name: lastSeenDate
members.doc: Price quote last seen date as ISO String.

members.name: timeZoneCode
members.doc: Price quote dates time zone code. Send when creating a new price quote.

docs.summary: An object that contains Price quote information.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: List of Price quote line items.

docs.summary: An object that contains response information.
An object that contains total price information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: fees
members.doc: List of total price itemized fees.

members.name: taxedAmount
members.doc: The sum of line items tax amount.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: The subtotal of the line items without the tax included.

members.name: total
members.doc: The total price of the itemized fees and taxes.

docs.summary: An object that contains information needed to update price quote.

members.name: data
members.doc: Price quote fields used to update the price quote.
